rows.label: qst100401_msg0001
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Blah li bleh ♪
Bloop grah grong ♪

rows.label: qst100401_msg0002
rows.name:
Why friends act worried? Friends
thinking that Falala is showing off
monster impression, is that it?

rows.label: qst100401_msg0003
rows.name:
That okay...
Everybody think so.
Falala know is hopeless...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0004
rows.name:
Falala want to become famous
as wonderful singer.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0005
rows.name:
Want to spread word of Falala
near and far across Alst.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0006
rows.name:
Then maybe he hear of me
and don't feel so alone...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh, Falala mean sonnypon Solala.
He go fishing one day and never
come back home.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0008
rows.name:
Falala sometimes wonder where
Solala is. Sometimes think about
going to look for him, but...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0009
rows.name:
Falala gets terrible seasickness.
Cannot ride boaty-boat.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0010
rows.name:
So at least want Solala to hear of
Falala. Even just Falala's name...
That why Falala start singing.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0011
rows.name:
But as friends could hear,
Falala has very terrible voice.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0012
rows.name:
At this rate, only thing Falala will be
famous for is monster impression...

rows.label: qst100401_msg0013
rows.name:
You want help Falala become
good singer?

rows.label: qst100401_msg0014
rows.name: Wow! Happy happy!

rows.label: qst100401_msg0015
rows.name:
Falala heard from customer that
there is special potion to make
anyone sing very good.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0016
rows.name: Potion name is Serenade.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0017
rows.name:
But only way to get potion is to
gather ingredients and make for
yourself. Can friends help?

rows.label: qst100401_msg0018
rows.name:
Wonderful!
Your spirit remind Falala of Solala.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0019
rows.name:
Potion needs two ingredients -
Cranberry Bell and Panda Pansy.
Can find in Gula Province.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0020
rows.name:
If friends bring ingredients, using
kitchen to make potion should be fine.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0021
rows.name:
Falala heard that potion depends
on perfect harmony of ingredients
during brewing process.

rows.label: qst100401_msg0022
rows.name: Hope we can do it!

rows.label: qst100401_msg0101
rows.name:
Potion require Cranberry Bell and
Panda Pansy from Gula Province!

rows.label: qst100401_msg0102
rows.name:
Boil ingredients together in
perfect ratio and falalaaaaaa!♪

rows.label: qst100401_msg0103
rows.name: You can use kitchen to brew potion.
